name: beaunifi
description: Smart beautify/minify server for JS and CSS with auto-detection. Use this when you need to read or edit minified JavaScript or CSS files. The server can detect if code is minified, beautify it for easier editing, and re-minify it when done. Workflow: 1) Use smart_process with action='read' to beautify minified code, 2) Edit the beautified code, 3) Use smart_process with action='write' to re-minify for production.

tools.name: beautify_js
tools.description: Beautify JavaScript code to make it readable. Use when you receive minified JS that needs editing.

tools.name: minify_js
tools.description: Minify JavaScript code for production. Use after editing to compress the code back.

tools.name: beautify_css
tools.description: Beautify CSS code to make it readable. Use when you receive minified CSS that needs editing.

tools.name: minify_css
tools.description: Minify CSS code for production. Use after editing to compress the code back.

tools.name: is_minified
tools.description: Check if code appears to be minified. Use to detect whether beautification is needed before editing.

tools.name: smart_process
tools.description: Smart workflow: auto-detect if code is minified, beautify if needed, apply modifications, and re-minify. Use action='read' to beautify for editing, action='edit' to apply changes while keeping beautified format, action='write' to re-minify for production.
